div.p: Wee tremble to repeate your filthy SpaniÅ¿h exploits (which is your praiÅ¿e) Å¿urely you haue thought of that Å¿ame old Å¿aying of yours; If I cannot mooue the gods aboue, I will trouble the diuels below.
